product_name: The North Face Morgan Soft-Shell Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Stand out on the slopes in The North Face Morgan women's soft-shell jacket. Unlike so many hum-drum winter jackets, it features an eye-catching plaid pattern. The North Face Apex ClimateBlock 3L soft-shell fabric is water resistant and windproof, and it maintains a comfortable level of breathability and 4-way stretch. Polyurethane-coated outer face provides nearly-waterproof performance while a soft, furry fleece inner face traps and holds heat. Single-cinch, fully adjustable hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit. The North Face Morgan jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets and an internal security pocket. Adjustable hem with cinch cord and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air while retaining valuable warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Stand out on the slopes in The North Face Morgan women's soft-shell jacket. Unlike so many hum-drum winter jackets, it features an eye-catching plaid pattern.
